title: 88/23/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 December 1987 approving the programme of measures submitted by the Greek Government for 1987 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 14 December 1987
approving the programme of measures submitted by the Greek Government for 1987 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(88/23/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme of measures on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece submitted by the Greek Government for 1987 is approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 December 1987.
For the Commission
Peter SCHMIDHUBER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 191, 23. 7. 1985, p. 53.
